verses.name: Nehemiah 11:29
verses.text: And at En–rimmon, and at Zareah, and at Jarmuth,

verses.name: Nehemiah 11:30
verses.text: Zanoah, Adullam, and in their villages, at Lachish, and the fields thereof, at Azekah, and in the villages thereof. And they dwelt from Beer–sheba unto the valley of Hinnom.

verses.name: Nehemiah 11:31
verses.text: The children also of Benjamin from Geba dwelt at Michmash, and Aija, and Beth–el, and in their villages,

verses.name: Nehemiah 11:35
verses.text: Lod, and Ono, the valley of craftsmen.

verses.name: Nehemiah 11:36
verses.text: And of the Levites were divisions in Judah, and in Benjamin.
